entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
